name: riddles-server
description: ``` ├── DAL/ │   └── riddles.dal.js              read/write to riddles database ├── DB/ │   └── riddles.txt                 riddles database ├── services/ │   └── riddles.services.js         CRUD ├── controllers/ │   └── riddles.controllers.js      Handle HTTP requests ├── routers/ │   └── riddles.router.js           Route by URL and method └── app.js
